## jx get vaults

Display one or more Vaults

### Synopsis

Display one or more vaults

```
jx get vaults [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # List all vaults
  jx get vaults
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help               help for vaults
  -n, --namespace string   Namespace from where to list the vaults

```
